name: Hex Blender
description:
Hex Blender is a fast paced shape dodging game in which players must navigate their way through shrinking hexes before they implode collide!

I made this shape dodging game by following a tutorial by Brackeys on YouTube.  The functionality is the same, but I made a few diversions with the code in regards to player control.

I also added a title screen and an end page that gives the player their score for the current attempt.
